name: help
description: Get a list of my commands and other stuff

name: mute
description: Mutes a user from chatting for specific time, uses timeout option

options.name: reason
options.description: Reason of the mute, example spamming

name: warn
description: Give a warning to user, they will loose access to all channels until they accept the warning

options.name: reason
options.description: Reason of the warn, example spamming.

options.name: message
options.description: What do you want me to say

name: report
description: Report a problem/rule break on this server DO NOT ABUSE

options.name: description
options.description: What/who do you want to report

name: roll
description: Rolls a dice, you can also change its size

name: funfact
description: get some random fun fact from database

name: slashreload
description: clear and register again my slash commands
